spec_data.Name: perl-Crypt-CBC
spec_data.Description:
This is Crypt::CBC, a Perl-only implementation of the cryptographic
cipher block chaining mode (CBC).  In combination with a block cipher
such as Crypt::DES or Crypt::IDEA, you can encrypt and decrypt
messages of arbitrarily long length.  The encrypted messages are
compatible with the encryption format used by SSLeay.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:48:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Encrypt Data with Cipher Block Chaining Mode
